title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported Jack Davison. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contribution Guidelines
text: Please ensure pull request adheres following guidelines: Search previous suggestions making new one, may duplicate. Make individual pull request new addition. Use roxygen2 @family tag categorise ipsum function either “practical” “whimsical”. functions named lipsum_*(). * need name API necessarily, generally describe kind output (e.g., lipsum_dino() dinosaurs). Function arguments try keeping lipsum functions. another function arguments behave identically function’s arguments, use argument names. Always name API ’re accessing function documentation, link using roxygen2 @source tag. Thank contribution!

code: example_loripsum <-   lipsum_loripsum(     n = 3L,     length = "short",     decorate = TRUE, # adds italics, bold, etc.     link = TRUE, # adds some links     ul = TRUE, # adds an unordered list (bullets)     ol = TRUE, # adds an ordererd list (numbers)     dl = TRUE, # adds a description list (headers and contents)     bq = TRUE, # adds a blockquote     code = TRUE, # adds code samples     headers = FALSE, # adds headers - may mess with RMarkdown/Quarto!     allcaps = FALSE, # capitalises the whole output     prude = TRUE # see above note   ) Itaque multi, cum in potestate essent hostium aut tyrannorum, multi in custodia, multi in exillo dolorem suum doctrinae studiis levaverunt. title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_literature() function really “silly” whimsical ipsum generators; grabs excerpts public domain classic literature like Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, . Users can opt paragraph list tags, don’t expect complicated elements . grew dark seemed excitement amongst passengers, kept speaking , one , though urging speed. lashed horses unmercifully long whip, wild cries encouragement urged exertions. darkness see sort patch grey light ahead us, though cleft hills. excitement passengers grew greater; crazy coach rocked great leather springs, swayed like boat tossed stormy sea. hold . road grew level, appeared fly along. mountains seemed come nearer us side frown upon us; entering Borgo Pass. One one several passengers offered gifts, pressed upon earnestness take denial; certainly odd varied kind, given simple good faith, kindly word, blessing, strange mixture fear-meaning movements seen outside hotel Bistritz–sign cross guard evil eye. , flew along, driver leaned forward, side passengers, craning edge coach, peered eagerly darkness. evident something exciting either happening expected, though asked passenger, one give slightest explanation. state excitement kept little time; last saw us Pass opening eastern side. dark, rolling clouds overhead, air heavy, oppressive sense thunder. seemed though mountain range separated two atmospheres, now got thunderous one. now looking conveyance take Count. moment expected see glare lamps blackness; dark. light flickering rays lamps, steam hard-driven horses rose white cloud. see now sandy road lying white us, sign vehicle. passengers drew back sigh gladness, seemed mock disappointment. already thinking best , driver, looking watch, said others something hardly hear, spoken quietly low tone; thought “hour less time.” turning , said German worse :– “carriage . Herr expected . now come Bukovina, return -morrow next day; better next day.” Whilst speaking horses began neigh snort plunge wildly, driver hold . , amongst chorus screams peasants universal crossing , calèche, four horses, drove behind us, overtook us, drew beside coach. see flash lamps, rays fell , horses coal-black splendid animals. driven tall man, long brown beard great black hat, seemed hide face us. see gleam pair bright eyes, seemed red lamplight, turned us. said driver:– “early -night, friend.” man stammered reply:–
code: example_lit <-   lipsum_literature(     n = 3L,     tag = "p", # add p tags     source = "dracula"   ) # take from dracula

title: Whimsical Placeholders
text: lipsum_bacon() lipsum_hipster() similar options identical simply (partly) replace random Latin lorem ipsum meat words hipster-y phrases, respectively. MEAT: Bacon ipsum dolor amet pig tongue pancetta pork belly, alcatra sausage tenderloin meatloaf venison. Sirloin leberkas pork shankle bresaola salami pig biltong swine andouille. Strip steak buffalo tenderloin pig ham pancetta pork belly cow chicken drumstick tri-tip hamburger. Pig beef ribs sausage, venison chislic ham hock pork belly tenderloin andouille ham filet mignon ball tip shank pork loin. Ball tip prosciutto turducken, cupim beef ribs pork chop chuck. HIPSTER: ’m baby gorpcore cred coloring book kogi. Solarpunk tacos man bun edison bulb pok pok lomo. Vegan locavore yr shabby chic. Neutral milk hotel biodiesel vape jianbing roof party green juice heirloom blackbird spyplane. Roof party meggings biodiesel retro poke, tousled chambray pop-whatever distillery leggings.
code: example_meat <- lipsum_bacon(   n_sentences = 5L,   type = "all-meat",   start_with_lorem = TRUE )  example_hipster <- lipsum_hipster(   n_sentences = 5L,   type = "hipster-centric",   start_with_lorem = TRUE )

title: Obtain Lorem Ipsum Text From Web APIs
text: goal lipsum get easy access several “Lorem Ipsum” web APIs simply generate customisable placeholder text. R world, likely commonly used within RMarkdown/Quarto documents Shiny apps. lorem package also serves similar purpose, lipsum’s interfacing variety APIs may allow flexible placeholder outputs. example, lipsum_loripsum() function gives lot control kinds features placeholder text (example, lists, links, headers, ). lipsum owes lot awesome-ipsum list, uses categorisations: Practical, placeholder generators useful “professional” settings. either generate text Latin, business-sounding text like newspaper articles. Whimsical, playful generators impersonate celebrities, list names dinosaurs, use profanity, . perhaps appropriate personal projects!

Habes, inquam, Cato, formam eorum, de quibus loquor, philosophorum. Sed erat aequius Triarium aliquid de dissensione nostra iudicare. Idemne, quod iucunde? Immo alio genere; Quo modo?

  1. Quae diligentissime contra Aristonem dicuntur a Chryippo.
  2. Si longus, levis dictata sunt.
  3. Suam denique cuique naturam esse ad vivendum ducem.
  4. Non ego tecum iam ita iocabor, ut isdem his de rebus, cum L.
  5. Satisne ergo pudori consulat, si quis sine teste libidini pareat?

One adventures-sherlock-holmes, dr-jekyll--mr-hyde, dracula, evelina, life--samuel-johnson, picture--dorian-gray, pride--prejudice. default, NULL, chooses one random.

what: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: Generates random, customisable placeholder text using Loripsum Web API.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
code: lipsum_loripsum(   n = 5L,   length = "short",   decorate = FALSE,   link = FALSE,   ul = FALSE,   ol = FALSE,   dl = FALSE,   bq = FALSE,   code = FALSE,   headers = FALSE,   allcaps = FALSE,   prude = FALSE,   plaintext = FALSE )

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: https://loripsum.net/

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Loripsum API — lipsum_loripsum
text: n Integer. number paragraphs generate. Defaults 5. length Character. average length paragraph. Can "short", "medium", "long" "verylong". Defaults "short". decorate Logical. TRUE, bold, italic marked text. Defaults FALSE. link Logical. TRUE, adds links. Defaults FALSE. ul Logical. TRUE, adds unordered lists. Defaults FALSE. ol Logical. TRUE, adds numbered/ordered lists. Defaults FALSE. dl Logical. TRUE, adds description lists. Defaults FALSE. bq Logical. TRUE, adds blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. code Logical. TRUE, adds code samples. Defaults FALSE. headers Logical. TRUE, adds headers. Defaults FALSE. allcaps Logical. TRUE, uses CAPS. Defaults FALSE. prude Logical. TRUE, removes Latin words construed offensive English, like 'sex' 'homo'. Defaults FALSE. plaintext Logical. TRUE, returns plain text without HTML tags. Defaults FALSE.

what: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: Generates customisable placeholder text using Lorem Markdownum API, formatted markdown.

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
code: lipsum_markdown(   n = 5L,   no_headers = FALSE,   no_code = FALSE,   no_inline_markup = FALSE,   no_quotes = FALSE,   no_lists = FALSE,   no_external_links = FALSE,   no_wrapping = FALSE,   underline_headers = FALSE,   reference_links = FALSE,   underscore_em = FALSE,   underscore_strong = FALSE,   fenced_code_blocks = FALSE )

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: https://jaspervdj./lorem-markdownum/

title: Generate markdown-formatted Lorem Ipsum using the Lorem Markdownum API — lipsum_markdown
text: n Integer. number "blocks" generate. Defaults 5. no_headers Logical. TRUE, removes headers. Defaults FALSE. no_code Logical. TRUE, removes code snippets. Defaults FALSE. no_inline_markup Logical. TRUE, removes inline markup. Defaults FALSE. no_quotes Logical. TRUE, removes blockquotes. Defaults FALSE. no_lists Logical. TRUE, removes lists. Defaults FALSE. no_external_links Logical. TRUE, replaces external links internal links. Defaults FALSE. no_wrapping Logical. TRUE, prevents text wrapping. Defaults FALSE. underline_headers Logical. TRUE, headers underlined. Defaults FALSE. reference_links Logical. TRUE, uses reference-style links. Defaults FALSE. underscore_em Logical. TRUE, styles  using underscores. Defaults FALSE. underscore_strong Logical. TRUE, styles  using double underscores. Defaults FALSE. fenced_code_blocks Logical. TRUE, fences code blocks back-ticks. Defaults FALSE.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum using the Seazon.org API — lipsum_seazon
text: latin Logical. TRUE, generates Latin text. Otherwise generates random text. Defaults TRUE. start_with_lorem Logical. TRUE, begins text 'Lorem Ipsum'. Defaults TRUE. use_periods Logical. TRUE, uses periods. Defaults TRUE. use_sentence_case Logical. TRUE, begins sentence upper case character. Defaults TRUE. p Logical. TRUE, wraps text paragraph tags. Defaults TRUE. use_double_spaces Logical. TRUE, puts double spaces sentence. Defaults FALSE. random_numbers Logical. TRUE, adds random numbers 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. random_latin Logical. TRUE, makes random text latin-like 'latin = FALSE'. Defaults TRUE. min_letters, max_letters Minimum/maximum numbers letters word, 'latin = FALSE'. min_words, max_words Minimum/maximum paragraph word count. min_paras, max_paras Minimum/maximum number paragraphs.#'

title: lipsum (development version)
